Text: Hey slimshd thanks for all your uploads of Friends series! Excellent quality. Looking forward for the rest seasons... Do you know where I can get subtitles for your uploads?
even i couldnt find subtitles ..i will try to sync subs and also add it for rest of episodes
we can only check the quality if you will seed it...pls. seed slimshd and thans for uploading it

http://www.tvsubtitles.net/tvshow-65-4.html

Get the subtitles from here...they will give you the zip files......extract the files.... change the name of the sub files to the name that slimshd upload video file has and keep both the vid and sub files in the same folder.....the subs will automatically activated in VLC or any other media....do let me know if you still have problems with Subs....
When you have time, please upload the rest of the season. Thank you so much for this!
Quality is sexxaaaaay. Upload rest quickly ! Thanks :D

plz wait few days more..even i dont like to keep you guys waiting..i am still facing audio sync problems in few episodes..but tht would be over soon..will upload after 4 to 5 days..and welcome u all..:-)

Sir , i just made my account to THANK u from bottom of my heart ... Great Job... Could u plz also tell me where to get season 6 n 7 . u mention they r already uploaded.... by u or someone else ?? 

Once again thanks alot . and FRIENDS ROCK !!!
